name: Carrot & Coriander Soup
title: Carrot & Coriander Soup
instructions: Dice the onion, chop the carrots into slices and the potato into 1cm cubes. Prepare the vegetable stock
Heat a pan on medium high heat. Add 1 tbsp of oil and fry the onions for 5 minutes.
Add the ground coriander to the onions. Then add the potato and cook for 1 minute.
Add the carrots and brown for 1-2 minutes.
Add the mix to a saucepan with the vegetable stock and simmer for around 20 minutes.
Mix in a food processor with the fresh coriander and some salt to taste.
